description_txt: stated on January 12, 2012 in a U.S. Senate debate hosted by Empower Texans and the Texas Public Policy Foundation:
quote_txt: Says "we brought crime rate down by 30 percent" when he was mayor of Dallas.

description_txt: stated on February 2, 2012 in congressional website :
quote_txt: In just a few decades, Social Security, Medicare and Medicaid, other mandatory spending programs, and paying interest due on the debt will eclipse our entire budget.

description_txt: stated on January 31, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says Mitt Romney’s campaign "has already spent more on negative ads than John McCain did during his entire presidential run."

description_txt: stated on December 6, 2011 in an interview:
quote_txt: Says she "wiped out" the state Agriculture Department’s inspections of eggs at retail sites like grocery stores.

description_txt: stated on January 24, 2012 in a blog post.:
quote_txt: "The national debt is equal to $48,700 for every American or $128,300 for every U.S. household. It is now equivalent to the size of our entire economy."

description_txt: stated on January 9, 2012 in a speech on the state Senate floor:
quote_txt: "United States of America is twenty-sixth in school performance in the world."

description_txt: stated on January 31, 2012 in a news conference:
quote_txt: "We've seen more anti-women's choice bills introduced in the first half of this session than we've seen in the last three General Assemblies."

description_txt: stated on January 31, 2012 in a television commercial:
quote_txt: "One out of every three automobile fatalities can be attributed to alcohol."

description_txt: stated on January 20, 2012 in a debate:
quote_txt: "We got [the Quonset Business Park] for free and we’re getting zero dollars out of it into the state coffers … other than the fact that it produces the jobs."

description_txt: stated on January 26, 2012 in an interview with Michelangelo Signorile on the Sirius satellite radio show “OutQ.”:
quote_txt: AIDS was transmitted to humans because "one guy" had sex with "a monkey" and then started "having sex with men."

description_txt: stated on January 5, 2012 in a press release.:
quote_txt: Congressman Scott DesJarlais "is spending his one year anniversary on vacation -- only working 6 days in all of January."

description_txt: stated on January 23, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Says U.S. Senate Democrats "have gone without any budget at all" for more than 1,000 days.

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Says Pennsylvania charges a top income tax rate of 3 percent and Delaware "has no state income tax at all."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2012 in a speech in Tampa, Fla.:
quote_txt: "Gov. Romney cut off kosher meals for Jewish senior citizens who were on Medicaid to save $5 a day."

description_txt: stated on January 24, 2012 in the State of the Union speech:
quote_txt: "Today, for the first time in fifteen years, Master Lock’s unionized plant in Milwaukee is running at full capacity."

description_txt: stated on January 25, 2012 in a press statement:
quote_txt: "Unemployment has fallen from 10 percent during the president’s first year in office to 8.5 percent today."

description_txt: stated on January 20, 2012 in a news release.:
quote_txt: "A cashier earning $20,000 per year pays the same (Virginia) income tax rate as a hedge fund manager earning $20 million per year."

description_txt: stated on January 25, 2012 in a press statement:
quote_txt: Since President Barack Obama took office, "2 million more Americans are out of work."

description_txt: stated on January 29, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: In 1992, Mitt Romney "gave money to Democrats for Congress."

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2012 in a town hall in Jacksonville, Fla.:
quote_txt: "The Obama administration ... would impose on every Catholic institution, every Jewish institution, every Protestant institution the Obamacare standard of what you have to buy as insurance."

description_txt: stated on January 16, 2012 in a Republican presidential debate in South Carolina:
quote_txt: Says the U.S. federal income tax rate was 0 percent until 1913.

description_txt: stated on January 19, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: Savannah is home to "the fastest-growing port in the nation."

description_txt: stated on January 25, 2012 in a congressional hearing:
quote_txt: "Federal, state and local governments have subsidized the production of the Volt to the tune of estimates between $50,000 and $250,000 per vehicle sold."

description_txt: stated on January 17, 2012 in a YouTube video:
quote_txt: "Sheldon Whitehouse's failure of leadership, the adding of almost $8 trillion in debt in his first full term, is shameful..."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • January 31, 2012

description_txt: stated on January 30, 2012 in a chain e-mail and blog and Facebook posts:
quote_txt: In July 1996, Mitt Romney helped locate the missing teenage daughter of a partner at Bain Capital.

description_txt: stated on January 28, 2012 in comments at a campaign event:
quote_txt: Students today "take more years to get through" college.

description_txt: stated on January 27, 2012 in a legislative hearing:
quote_txt: A proposed mine in Wisconsin is "about two-thirds the size of Lake Winnebago."

description_txt: stated on January 25, 2012 in a video ad posted on YouTube:
quote_txt: Says with "Gov. Chris Christie and bipartisan reformers" New Jersey had "the most job growth in 11 years."

description_txt: stated on January 10, 2012 in his State of the State address:
quote_txt: Siemens has been unable to fill approximately 200 skilled trade positions in metro Atlanta.

description_txt: stated on January 3, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: "We wiped out a $3.6 billion deficit without raising taxes."
